content: Just keep working your way up to the top of the path, taking out as many soldiers as you want along the way. You'll pass by a portion of the path covered in fire, and then enter into a cave.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'Return Path'.
The content is as follows:
Just keep working your way up to the top of the path, taking out as many soldiers as you want along the way. You'll pass by a portion of the path covered in fire, and then enter into a cave.
